0.1.0.name: wordpress/buddypress-restrict-email-domains
0.1.0.description:
** IMPORTANT **

This plugin will not be updated for future versions of BuddyPress (1.3) - if you would like to take over this plugin, please contact me. http://twitter.com/#!/etiviti/statuses/29550143485247489

This plugin enables restriction of email domains during user registration for a single (non-multisite) WordPress installation of BuddyPress

This plugin will NOT work for a multisite/network WordPress install - intended for single WordPress ONLY.

Related Links:

  • Plugin About Page
  • Author's BuddyPress Demo Site
